attributes.action: Tell us what our Deputy Prime Minister does as it seems that Gordon Brown has taken his position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown keeps flying off to Iraq etc and apearing with the Prime Minister at all conferences and Events.

Gordon is our countries accountant and as yet is not the Prime Minister. We are paying for John Prescott and what for ???

I am sure this petition will not get published.
